headline: Amazon And Microsoft Engineers Quit At 23 To Launch AI Startup Bluejay, Raise $4 Million With Y Combinator And Floodgate
summary: At just 23 years old, Rohan Vasishth and Faraz Siddiqi left jobs at Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) and Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) to pursue a risky bet. The bet consisted in launching their own startup from a San Francisco hacker house, only to secure $4 million in seed funding for their company Bluejay, a platform designed to stress-test AI agents before they reach customers, Business Insider reported.
